Quick + Easy Quilts

Edition: October/November 2022
SKU: EQEQ22004
$9.99

Quick + Easy Quilts

Edition: October/November 2022
SKU: EQEQ22004
$9.99
  • About This Issue
  • See What's Inside!

Get ready for a cozy autumn season with this issue of Quick + Easy Quilts! You’ll find a cornucopia of fun fall-themed projects—including quilts with spooky black cats, plump pumpkins, and wild webs of color. If you’re ready to explore die-cutting, we also have a great article and patterns to help you get started. Always included: Quilt of Valor®, baby quilts, color options, and quilts that can be made in a weekend!

Patterns
  • Two by Four Designed and made by Kristie Shreffler.
  • Harvest Time Designed and made by Maria Dzreeva.
  • Whiskers and Chains Designed and made by Michelle Sandoval.
  • Spellbinding Designed and made by Brenda Plaster.
  • Wonky Webs Designed and made by Annette Falvo.
  • Dancing Bear Cabin Designed and made by Tracy Mooney.
  • Heroes Proved Designed and made by Krisanne Watkins.
  • Scrappy Patch Designed and made by Abigail Dolinger.
  • Midnight Starlight Designed and made by Megan Best.
  • Maple Leaves and Nine-Patches Designed and made by Bea Lee.
Features
  • Beginner Boot Camp – Pick the right die-cutting machine for you.
  • Tried+True – Editors share their favorite indie businesses.
